description: This file contains environment utility functions for a React application, including environment variable parsing, feature flag management, and configuration retrieval.

methods.name: readEnv
methods.description: Safely reads a string environment variable with optional default, trimming whitespace.

methods.name: parseCSVFlagsToSet
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string into a set of normalized flags.

methods.name: setToMap
methods.description: Converts a set of flags into an object map for easy lookup.

methods.name: internalGetRawApiBase
methods.description: Retrieves the API base URL from environment variables, preferring REACT_APP_API_BASE.
